paper_abstract: This paper presents a new hybrid variable neighborhood-tabu search heuristic for the Vehicle Routing Problem with Multiple Time windows. It also proposes a minimum backward time slack algorithm applicable to a multiple time windows environment. This algorithm records the minimum waiting time and the minimum delay during route generation and adjusts the arrival and departure times backward. The implementation of the proposed heuristic is compared to an ant colony heuristic on benchmark instances involving multiple time windows. Computational results on newly generated instances are provided. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A hybrid variable neighborhood tabu search heuristic for the vehicle routing problem with multiple time windows
